desc: Vertimax is the leader in athlete training, providing cutting-edge training equipment designed to fit the need of any athlete or fitness enthusiast who wants results.

layout.text: "The customer service was great! All questions were answered quickly and helped point me in the right direction. As a basketball coach, I have wanted a Vertimax for a while for my team. I was able to get that plus enough equipment to train 5 at a time." Corey McElveen
